Message:
“Today, I replaced
the soil in the garden,

The seeds I planted last week
have started sprouting...”

I walk through the garden
while reading Dad’s diary,
as if I were retracing
his footsteps.

There it was—
a beautiful flower blossoming
quietly in a corner of the garden.

Of course.
It’s the flower that brought
him and Mom together,

so it’s only natural that
it’s his favorite.

The Curse in my heart
looks just like the flower
that Dad loved.
I was always scared of it, but...

“So, it’s thanks to you
that Mom and Dad met,
and that I was born.”
I gently brush the special flower.

It didn’t wither at the touch
of my fingertips, and only moved
as if it were dancing happily.
